turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can I order a coffee drink from Starbucks for pickup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, what drink would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get a Caffe Mocha?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande would be great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. What kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I have almond milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure. Do you want whipped cream or no whipped cream?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Any other modifications?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, can I have extra whipped cream?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, can I get light mocha syrup?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You got it. There are two Starbucks near you. Which one should I order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order from the Starbucks on MLK in Fayetteville?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem. I have a grande Caffe Mocha with almond milk, extra whipped cream, light mocha syrup for pickup from the Starbucks on MLK in Fayetteville, AR. Does that sound good?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's perfect!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, your order should be ready for pickup in 20 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: No problem! Have a great rest of your day!
